Author: dragaynite
Text: I’ve been stuck in the 140s for EVER and I know it’s from the binging and I stopped counting calories. But now I’m back in my bullshit because I hate that number. I hate it. It hurts me to see it. I know I could just stop weighing myself but if I don’t weigh myself, I’ll obsess over the idea of not knowing. So I’m going to continue until I break free from this stupid plateau

Author: relativelyinsanee
Text: The same exact thing happens to me. I get stuck on an interval of 10 pounds but once I get past the hump, getting down another 10 is no sweat. I don't understand!!!
